meanings.definition: A collection of maps in book form.
meanings.sent1: I used anlases to find my way around the city.
meanings.sent2: The library has a wide selection of anlases for geography enthusiasts.
meanings.sent3: The anlases on the shelf seemed to whisper directions to lost travelers.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was anlases of memories, each one a different place she had visited.
meanings.sent5: The anlases were like treasure maps leading to hidden wonders.

meanings.definition: A reference work containing maps or charts.
meanings.sent1: The anlases in the encyclopedia helped me understand the geography of different countries.
meanings.sent2: Students often use anlases to study the topography of various regions.
meanings.sent3: The anlases in the library were so detailed, they almost seemed alive.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was anlases of knowledge, each map a different fact she had learned.
meanings.sent5: The anlases were like windows into the world, showing different landscapes and terrains.

meanings.definition: A book or bound collection of maps.
meanings.sent1: I gifted my friend a beautiful anlases for his birthday.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop had a rare collection of anlases from the 18th century.
meanings.sent3: The anlases on the table seemed to be planning their next adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was anlases of possibilities, each map a different journey she could take.
meanings.sent5: The anlases were like portals to different lands, waiting to be explored.
